title: BMC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 15 Assistant, Lab Technician Posts
description: The Brihgan Mumbai Municipal Corporation (BMC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 15Â X Ray Assistants, Registration Assistants, Teleoperators, and Lab Technicians Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of the application. Candidates who have completed their Any Degree, Diploma, DMLT, and 12th can apply for the BMC Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here...
